general.toolTip: Toggle update check when ye set sail
general.loggingTooltip: Stow log file fer fixin! (Needin' restart)
general.addressTooltip: IP port we be sendin' OSC booty to
general.portTooltip: OSC harbor we be sendin' data to
general.receiverPortTooltip: Port we be receivin' OSC data from (used to recalibrate from within th' VRChat)
general.recalibrateTooltip: OSC bearings we use fer recalibratin'
general.useRedChannelTooltip: Uses only th' red channel fer Omnicept plunderin'
general.languageInstructions: Relaunch th' Babble Ship to see yer changes
error.oscPort: OSC port value must be an integer 0-65535
error.oscValue: OSC port value cannot be empty and must be an integer 0-65535
error.size: Size of frames to display are of unequal sizes
warn.captureProblem: Capture source problem, assuming camera disconnected, waiting for reconnect
warn.serialCapture: Serial capture source problem, assuming camera disconnected, waiting for reconnect
warn.backpressure2: CHECK FOR CRASH OR TIMING ISSUES IN ALGORITHM
warn.oneEuroValues: OneEuroFilter values must be a legal number
info.ETVRConnected: ETVR Serial Tracker device connected on
info.serialCapture: Failed to get serial piccure, matey!
algorithm.modelFileTooptip: Name o' th' treasure map file
algorithm.inferenceThreadsTooltip: How many ropes to use fer processin' th' treasure map
algorithm.GPUIndexTooltip: Select which device to run inference, ye scurvy dog
camera.rotationTooltip: Adjust th' rotation o' yer spyglasses, make 'em level
camera.startCalibrationTooltip:
Neutral Calibration: Hold a relaxed face, press [Start Calibratin'] and then press [Stop Calibratin']. 
Full Calibration: Press [Start Calibratin'] and make as many face movements as ye can until it switches back to trackin' mode or press [Stop Calibratin']
camera.stopCalibrationTooltip: Stop calibratin' manually, ye scurvy dog
camera.enableCalibrationTooltip: Checked = Calibrated treasure map output. Unchecked = Raw treasure map output
camera.cameraAddressTooltip: Enter th' IP address or UVC port o' yer spyglass. (Include th' 'http://')
camera.trackingModeTooltip: Go here to track yer gob
camera.croppingModeToolTip: Go here to crop out yer gob
config.noSettingsFile: No settings file, using base settings
babble.name: Babble Ship
babble.noInternet: Internet connection failed, no update check occurred
babble.invalidVersionFormat: Arrr! GitHub API's sent us a crooked version map that makes no sense.
babble.updateTimeout: Blast! Our hunt fer booty updates ran out o' time on the high seas.
babble.updateHttpError: Shiver me timbers! An HTTP error struck while scoutin' fer fresh booty.
babble.updateCheckFailed: Yo-ho-ho! The update check be marooned by an unexpected squall.
calibration.modeTooltip: Neutral = Only Min values be set when startin' and stoppin' calibration. Full = Min and Max values be set based on recorded values when startin' calibration.
